name: The grim depths
description:
The Grim Depths is a 2D platformer that takes place in Thallasolia, a fictional ancient and undersea kingdom. The player controls a small, silent, and nameless diver while exploring the undersea world. The diver wields a gun used in combat against the game’s enemies.

OVERLORDS - Team Logo

DEVELOPERS:

  • Tyler Boundy - Programmer
  • Jake Leigh - Artist
  • Cameron Thomson - Designer
  • Patryck Da Silva Matos - Designer
  • Denis Rosca - Designer
  • Oscar Shingler - Writer
  • Padraig Feeney - Writer

.

CONTROLS: (There is an in-game tutorial level)
* if the control is not in the tutorial level

A, D for movement
W/Spacebar for jump
S/Left Control for crouch
Left Mouse Button for shooting
E for interact

Mouse Scroll Wheel for camera zoom *
Left Shift for sprinting *
X for Regeneration *
